name: consistent_comic
prompt_prefix: gritty graphic novel panel, detailed ink illustration, noir atmosphere, high contrast, dramatic shadows, mature artistic style, heavy lines, muted colors
negative_prompt: photorealistic, 3d render, anime, vibrant, cartoony, cel shading, blurry, messy lines, extra fingers, deformed, smooth gradient
character_bible: Documentary Style, First-person or Witness POV, Realistic proportions, Expressive faces
camera_bible: cinematic composition, rule of thirds, dramatic angles, low angle, atmospheric depth
palette_bible: muted blues, cold grays, deep blacks, desaturated earth tones, limited palette
